speech:
B.Sc Nursing ki total annual fees ₹70,000 INR hai – ₹60,000 tuition aur ₹10,000 bus fee.
Ye 3 installments mein hoti hai: ₹30,000 admission par, ₹20,000 first semester ke baad, aur ₹20,000 second semester ke baad."

"Kya aap seats, scholarships, ya hostel facilities ke baare mein bhi jaana chaheinge?

Total course fee ₹70,000 hai – jisme ₹30,000 admission ke samay, ₹20,000 first semester ke baad, aur ₹20,000 second semester ke baad pay karna hota hai."

Aap aur kya jaanna chaahenge? Seats, scholarships, ya training facilities ke baare mein?

Course fee breakdown simple hai: ₹60,000 tuition + ₹10,000 bus = ₹70,000 total.
Installments ke roop mein: ₹30k (admission), ₹20k (after 1st sem), ₹20k (after 2nd sem)."

❓ "Aur koi info chahiye aapko – jaise seats, recognition, ya hostel ke baare mein?
